meanings.sent1: She decided to rebooks her flight for next week.
meanings.sent2: He always rebooks his favorite hotel for their annual vacation.
meanings.sent3: The travel agent joked that she could rebooks his trip in her sleep.
meanings.sent4: His love for the city rebooks every time he visits.
meanings.sent5: The idea of rebooking the concert tickets excited her beyond belief.

meanings.definition: Books that have been booked again.
meanings.sent1: The library had a section dedicated to rebooks.
meanings.sent2: She borrowed one of the rebooks for her research paper.
meanings.sent3: The rebooks on the shelf looked almost brand new.
meanings.sent4: The rebooks were flying off the shelves at the bookstore.
meanings.sent5: Her collection of rebooks grew with each visit to the bookstore.
